channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CT

item.title: Report X-2024030671
item.description:
Report X-2024030671

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-21T15:13:33+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-01
  • City: BOZRAH
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE WAS FOUND LEAKING UPON UNLOADING OUT OF THE TRAILER. WHEN RESPONDED TO AND OPENED THERE WAS MULTIPLE UNDECLARED AEROSOLS FOUND INSIDE THE PACKAGE. ONE HAD THE CAP COMPLETELY OFF AND WAS EMPTY FROM THE PACKING MATERIAL PRESSING ON THE SPRAY NOZZLE.

item.title: Report X-2024030672
item.description:
Report X-2024030672

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-06
  • City: BOZRAH
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: UNITED PARCEL SERVICE
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: THE PACKAGE CAME DOWN THE BELT AND NEEDED TO BE RETAPED. UPON INSPECTION AND RETAPING THERE WERE 4 AEROSOL CANS FOUND INSIDE THE PACKAGE

item.title: Report X-2024030456
item.description:
Report X-2024030456

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-19T15:11:49+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-07
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg was dropped and placed in lined Hazmat bin and taken to the HMPA. DescribePack: There is a crack approximately 1/4 of the way around the bottom of the inner plastic container. One edge of the bottom closure ripped and tape failed allowing the inner container to fall out. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in lined Hazmat bin.

item.title: Report X-2024030461
item.description:
Report X-2024030461

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-19T15:11:49+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-07
  • City: WILLINGTON
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg with Ltd Qty diamond covered by barcode label was found wet and placed in an unlined unauthorized plastic bin and taken to the HMPA. DescribePack: Cap came off 1 x 15 oz. aerosol can packed in a carton with a printed Ltd Qty diamond that was covered by the shipper's barcode label and pushed the spray actuator releasing a small amount of pressurized contents which wet the packaged aerosol cans and carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Pkg placed in bin.

item.title: Report X-2024030345
item.description:
Report X-2024030345

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-14T18:15:01+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-06
  • City: SOUTH WINDSOR
  • State: CT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package was unloaded from trailer and sent on non-compatibles belt towards tugger line. Package was punctured and leaked prior to loading into delivery van. Package was removed from workflow and brought to QA cage for inspection. Package was placed in a plastic tote. DescribePack: Package has 1" punctured on its top, leaks when handled. DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Package was placed in a plastic tote to prevent further release or seepage of flammable liquid.
